data.name: VTube Token
data.description:
## What Is VTube Token (VTUBE)?

VTube Token is a dApp application platform built for virtual Youtubers, artists, and their fans. They offer a variety of services such as NFTs and Crypto donations, and make them easier to access.

VTUBE Token as of now is used for the following purposes:

* Reducing fees in various tiers while donation to a VTuber
* Use an single stake asset to farm NFTs
* Combined with BNB pair in a liquidity farm to gain NFTs

VTUBE DApps include: 

* Donation DApp: A fully Streamlabs integrated donation platform that allows for streamers to receive donations directly using Crypto and get notifications on their live stream.
* NFT Farm: We provide ways for VTubers to get royalties for their fanarts and for artists to have a safe platform for monetizing their work
* wAIfu Projekt: Inspired by AI generated artwork by platforms like Google’s DeepDream, wAIfu Projekt leverages the power of General Adversarial Neural Networks to generate cute anime girls as NFTs


## How Many VTUBE Tokens Are There in Circulation?

VTube Token was deployed on March 12, 2021 using Binance Smart Chain. The initial and the final supply of VTUBE was and will remain 36 Million VTUBE. The initial distribution of the token was 20% Team/Developer Tokens, 30% as liquidity (100% burnt) to Pancakeswap, and the remaining 50% was available to be farmed on Tenet. This token will be used in multiple ways across all their DApps. Different Mechanics such as NFT farms are used to incentivize holders to provide liquidity for the VTUBE Token.


### Who Are the Founders of VTUBE Token?

VTUBE Token is the brainchild of an anonymous dev only known as “adi”. He is a well known member across various crypto communities.

The developer is experienced in building web applications and doing some designing work. He is also getting good at writing Solidity code.

The project is also partnered with “Solomon Academy”, a VTuber agency that helps scout talented content creators. They have over 4 Virtual Youtubers partnered with them that use their donations platform.

### Where Can I Buy VTube Token (VTUBE)?

VTUBE is available for trading on the Binance Smart Chain’s DEX [PancakeSwap](https://exchange.pancakeswap.finance/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x25dfE3386525465802AF6Bfe499ded48017155ad)
